desc: A shining marble of pure ruby dubbed "Sun's Tear" after its magnificent shade.
lore:
A shining marble of pure ruby dubbed "Sun's Tear" after its magnificent shade.

Often set into jewelry or as a decorative flourish to a weapon, Sun's Tears enjoy relative popularity for its classy minimalism. Many choose to interpret the connotation of its name as one of joy.
name: Sun's Tear
